Chapter 6. Supported widgets
Prev   Next

Chapter 6. Supported widgets

Introduction

wxGlade supports a number of widgets and helps you to edit the visual look and properties of each one.

ContainersLayout WidgetsCommon WidgetsMenu bar / Status Bar / Tool bar

  • wxDialog

  • wxFrame

  • wxNotebook

  • wxPanel

  • wxScrolledWindow

  • wxSplitterWindow

  • wxBoxSizer

  • wxStaticBoxSizer

  • wxGridSizer

  • wxFlexGridSizer

  • Spacer

  • wxButton

  • wxBitmapButton

  • wxCalendarCtrl

  • wxCheckBox

  • wxChoice

  • wxComboBox

  • wxDatePickerCtrl

  • wxGauge

  • wxGenericCalendarCtrl

  • wxGrid

  • wxHyperlinkCtrl

  • wxListBox

  • wxListCtrl

  • wxPropertyGridManager

  • wxRadioBox

  • wxRadioButton

  • wxSlider

  • wxSpinButton

  • wxSpinCtrl

  • wxStaticBitmap

  • wxStaticLine

  • wxStaticText

  • wxTextCtrl

  • wxToggleButton

  • wxTreeCtrl

  • wxMenu

  • wxMenuBar

  • Menu Bar Separators

  • Sub Menus

  • wxStatusBar

  • wxToolBar

  • Tool Bar Separators

  • Tools

Missing widgets can be integrated using the “Custom Widget”.
